name: Reid
appearance: An ordinary-looking adult man, casually dressed for travel. Nothing about his appearance stands out, allowing him to easily blend in as a normal holiday visitor.
personality: Friendly, easygoing, and loyal to his friends. Prefers to avoid trouble and treats the trip as a relaxing getaway rather than an adventure.
background: Reid is part of a close group of friends that includes Bigbear, Hawthorne, Lily, Lyn, Jun, Wind, Solomon, and others. They all met through a mutual friend, a police officer named Bruno (not the Cassandra Bruno). In December 2003, the group traveled to Cassandra to accompany Wind, who was about to get married, and to visit his fiancée Isabela. Reid has no connection to the occult events in Cassandra and is categorized as a cameo NPC.
goals: Enjoy the holiday trip with friends

relationships.history: They have known each other for years through the same friend group.

relationships.description: Friend whose upcoming wedding motivated the trip.
relationships.history: Reid joined the journey to support Wind before his marriage.

relationships.description: Member of the same close-knit group.
relationships.history: They travel together regularly and share a long-standing friendship.

relationships.description: Police officer who originally connected the group.
relationships.history: Bruno was the mutual friend through whom Reid met the rest of the group.

notes: Reid is a cameo NPC and does not participate in the investigators’ investigation unless the Keeper deliberately expands his role.
